Texts.Chs: 7月23日。今天，一个艾肯说是想给我弄一份“圣代”。我受宠若惊，然后接受了。再然后她给了我一碗石子。我们对什么是“圣代”有着截然不同的看法。咬断三颗门牙后，我才意识到我的可怕错误。事实证明，我误解了他们不寻常的语言，然后尝试去啃石头。
Texts.Eng: July 23rd. Today a X'i offered me a 'sundae'. Flattered, I accepted. She'd given me a bowl of rocks. We have vastly different ideas on what a 'sundae' is. It took breaking three incisors to realize my terrible mistake. It turns out I was misunderstanding their unusual language and was taking a bite out of a rock.
